answers.answer: After 3 years of suffering CHF and trying to read all what I can about it, they only eating limitation that I am aware for CHF is to reduce the salt intake .... any other restriction will depend not of the CHF but of the cause of it .. HBP, MI, Viral, Idiopathic...Or when the disease progress, of the complications that it will produce: renal failure, diabetes, pulmonary edema ...
